roleset.name: scutter
roleset.note: SCUTTER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from scutter.01-v)

example.name: from Google
example.text: They scuttered swiftly towards the fire, raising and lowering their faces with erratic jerks, while the bean seeds rattled softlyin the turtle shells.
example.arg: raising and lowering their faces with erratic jerks
while the bean seeds rattled softly in the turtle shells
